title: Should you get a new COVID booster? If so, when?
author: LAURAN NEERGAARD AP Medical Writer
description: Booster shots that target currently circulating omicron strains are becoming available to a population with widely varying risks and levels of immunity.
cleaned_text: Thu, 07 Sep 2023 22:01:54 GMT (1694124114809) f21546d3a7b92848c6890935ca4e2b625f015352 4a6d0bb8f30f1b6a167248fbd029e9fd6e7edbb4 News Weather 7 On Your Side Community Game Center Watch Now 81 Wed 96 Thu 94 Should you get a new COVID booster? If so, when? by LAURAN NEERGAARD AP Medical Writer Fri, September 2nd 2022, 6:14 PM UTC This August 2022 photo provided by Pfizer shows vials of the company's updated COVID-19 vaccine during production in Kalamazoo, Mich. (Pfizer via AP)
